name: Be Still This Gentle Morning
description:
This album was recorded between November 2008 and February 2010 by Neil Pennycook and Alex Fenton (Fentek Audio).  The record was mixed by Alex Fenton.  The album was mastered by Jonnie Common.

The album was officially released through Wiseblood Industries on 17th May 2010.

The songs were written by Euan McMeeken and Graeme Anderson.  The lyrics were written by Euan McMeeken, except Swanfields, written by Graeme Anderson.  The songs were arranged by The Kays Lavelle.  All Rights Reserved.  The Copyright for these recording belongs to The Kays Lavelle 2010.
